import React,{useRef,useState}from'react';import'./BG.css';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function VideoEditor(){const inputRef=useRef();const[videoFile,setVideoFile]=useState(null);const[videoPreview,setVideoPreview]=useState(null);const[outputVideo,setOutputVideo]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleUpload=e=>{const file=e.target.files[0];if(file&&file.type.startsWith("video/")){setVideoFile(file);setVideoPreview(URL.createObjectURL(file));setOutputVideo(null);}};const handleRemoveBackground=async()=>{if(!videoFile)return;setLoading(true);const formData=new FormData();formData.append("video",videoFile);// ✅ must match backend
try{const res=await axios.post("gen-ai-video-editorai-ml028-production.up.railway.app/remove-background",formData,{headers:{"Content-Type":"multipart/form-data"},responseType:"blob"});const blob=new Blob([res.data],{type:"video/mp4"});setOutputVideo(URL.createObjectURL(blob));}catch(err){console.error(err);alert("Background removal failed");}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"BG",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"SideBar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>inputRef.current.click(),children:"Upload"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:handleRemoveBackground,children:"Remove BG"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"BodyBar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"UploadBox",onClick:()=>inputRef.current.click(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:inputRef,type:"file",accept:"video/*",style:{display:"none"},onChange:handleUpload}),videoPreview?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{src:videoPreview,controls:true}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Click to upload a video"})]}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"white"},children:"Processing video..."}),outputVideo&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"OutputBox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Background Removed:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{src:outputVideo,controls:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:outputVideo,download:"bg_removed.mp4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Download Video"})})]})]})]});}
